name: Survival (itch)
description:
Guide Egg home in the Survival Minigames!

Survival is an art project/series of minigames I designed from March 2017 - April 2017 for my Senior Art Exhibition.

This a single-player game designed to simulate environments and situations of social anxiety related to transportation. It can be played entirely without a mouse, using only WASD/arrow keys.

This game is completely free, and all I ask is that you do not claim it as your own or directly monetize off of it (selling related merch, selling the game, etc) because that's uncool. YouTube/Twitch LPs are fine! If you had fun playing it, show me/let me know!

Art and Design by Sam Luangkhot (me!)
